rooms.description: Open-plan living area that seamlessly integrates with the kitchen and garden view
Eco-friendly open-plan kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, natural light through large windows, integrated dining space
Integrated dining area within the living and kitchen space for communal meals
Master bedroom with ample natural light, north-east facing as per Vastu for health
Second bedroom positioned with privacy and south-west orientation for stability
Third bedroom designed to be versatile, can serve as guest room or home office, east facing following Vastu guidelines
Modern bathroom with water-efficient fixtures and natural light
